hero.title: Free Unlimited HEIC to PNG Converter

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Convert HEIC to PNG Online for Free
usage.description: Follow these 3 simple steps to transform your iPhone photos into high-quality PNGs.

items.title: 1. Upload HEIC Files
items.description: Drag and drop your .heic or .heif images directly into the converter box. You can select up to 100 files at a time (max 50MB each) for bulk processing. No account required.

items.title: 2. Sit Back & Relax
items.description: Our smart browser-based engine automatically processes your queue. It converts HEIC to PNG instantly using client-side technology, ensuring your photos are never uploaded to a slow server.

items.title: 3. Download PNG Images
items.description: Once the batch conversion is complete, click the green button to download a ZIP file containing all your converted PNG images. Your files are ready for use on Windows, Android, or the web.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Why We Are the Best Free HEIC to PNG Converter
feature.description: Experience the fastest, most secure, and unlimited way to convert your Apple photos to PNG format online.

items.title: 100% Secure Client-Side Conversion
items.description: Unlike other tools that upload your private photos to a server, our HEIC to PNG converter processes everything locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device, ensuring complete privacy. It is the safest way to convert personal photos.

items.title: Bulk Convert 100 Images at Once
items.description: Need to convert an entire holiday album? We support batch converting HEIC to PNG with up to 100 files per session. Our powerful engine handles large files (up to 50MB each) seamlessly, saving you hours of manual work.

items.title: Completely Free & Unlimited
items.description: Forget about "daily limits" or "paywalls." HeicToPng.org is a truly free HEIC to PNG converter. You can convert as many files as you need without signing up, installing software, or adding a credit card.

items.title: Instant Transformation
items.description: By eliminating the need to upload files to a cloud server, we save you massive amounts of time. The conversion starts the moment you drop your files. Experience the fastest HEIC to PNG process available on the web, even on mobile data.

items.title: Original Quality Retention
items.description: We prioritize quality. Our tool converts your .heic files to .png while preserving the original resolution, color depth, and transparency. Get crisp, clear images perfect for editing, printing, or web usage without compression artifacts.

items.title: Works on Windows, Mac & Android
items.description: HEIC files are great for iPhones but hard to open on Windows. Our tool solves this compatibility issue instantly. Open, view, and convert HEIC to PNG on any operating system or device directly from your Chrome, Safari, or Edge browser.

faq.name: faq
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about converting HEIC files.

items.title: Is HeicToPng.org really free and unlimited?
items.description: Yes! Unlike other converters that limit you to 5 or 10 files, HeicToPng.org is completely free. You can batch convert up to 100 HEIC files at a time without any daily limits, paywalls, or sign-ups.

items.title: Is it safe to convert private photos on this website?
items.description: Absolutely. We use Client-Side Processing technology. This means your photos are converted directly inside your browser and are never uploaded to our servers. Your personal data stays on your device, ensuring 100% privacy and security.

items.title: How do I open HEIC files on Windows?
items.description: Windows does not support HEIC files natively by default. The fastest way to view them is to use our tool to convert HEIC to PNG. Once converted, you can open, edit, and share your images on Windows 10, Windows 11, or any other system effortlessly.

items.title: Does converting HEIC to PNG lose image quality?
items.description: No. PNG is a lossless format. Our converter preserves the original resolution, colors, and details of your HEIC photos. While the file size might increase slightly compared to compressed JPGs, the visual quality remains identical to the original Apple photo.

items.title: Can I convert multiple HEIC files at once?
items.description: Yes, we support robust batch processing. You can drag and drop up to 100 HEIC images (max 50MB each) simultaneously. Our tool will process them in a queue and allow you to download them all as a single ZIP file.

items.title: Does PNG support transparent backgrounds?
items.description: Yes. If your original HEIF/HEIC image contains transparency data, converting it to PNG will preserve that transparency. This makes PNG the ideal format for logos, graphics, and editing layers.

items.title: Can I use this converter on my iPhone or Android?
items.description: Yes. HeicToPng.org is fully responsive and works directly in mobile browsers like Safari and Chrome. You can convert photos directly from your phone's gallery without installing any extra apps.

items.title: What is the difference between HEIC and PNG?
items.description: HEIC (High Efficiency Image Coding) is Apple's format for saving space on iPhones. PNG (Portable Network Graphics) is a universally compatible format known for lossless quality and transparency. Converting to PNG ensures your photos can be viewed on all devices and websites.
